alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 5:17PM PST until January 09 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ TO 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Light snow accumulation less than an inch anticipated on Tuesday will impact travel and create areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...In Idaho, Southwest Highlands. In Oregon, Harney County and Malheur County. * WHEN...From 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ to 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snowfall with very cold temperatures will likely continue through the Thursday morning with a very active pattern anticipated through Saturday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
